item.title: Convolutional networks, CIFAR-10 and complexity
item.description: Introduction In solving an Image Classification task, the task is to Having to attribute to an image one of the labels among those available. This means that, unlike many other tasks classics of computer vision, we need only this information; we won’t have to tell where the object is in the image with a bounding box or define membership classes pixel by pixel. Image, one class among a set of predefined classes, with no overlap.
